Critter

THE WEB'S GEEKIST SHOW

JUST GOT GEEKIER

Join the Beta

Critter is a companion app for the Dungeon and Dragons adventure show, Critical Role. It provides news ways for fans to interact with the show and connect with other fans.

Watch

Watch episodes with additional content like relevant fan art and tweets.




Track

View and track Critical role stats like rolls, kills, and successes.




Cooperate

Help build a growing community of fans like you.

What is Critical Role?

Critical Role is a show streamed online by the Geek and Sundry network. It is, on the surface, a Dungeons and Dragons campaign run by voice actor Matt Mercer. On a deeper level, however, it takes on many roles for many different people.

For the voice actors that star in Critical Role, the show is a time to see their best friends. For fans, it is everything from quality entertainment to a creative outlet. It's a show by geeks, for geeks.

Want to be a Critter?

Critter isn't ready for you just yet. It's still under development, but should be ready soon.
If you want to try out Critter as soon as possible, you can sign up to be a beta tester. Just submit your email address below.

If you just want updates on how Critter is progressing, you can follow me on Twitter @MikeWCornish.
